reviews.title: He loves it!
reviews.review_text: it was a gift for my husband's birthday and he absolutely loves it. the last monitor hale had was giving him neck problems but not this one! I love it and so does he!

reviews.title: works and love it
reviews.review_text: Walmart actually delivered the same day! easy to hook up and the picture quality is great. Vibrant colors and seems to be easier on my eyes. Only problem, if you want to call it that, is I had to increase the size of the fonts so I could see it better. I am actually thinking about purchasing another one to use on my laptop.

screen is the right size and its light to mount on a single arm bracket. it has two unouts to connect to a PC or laptop and extend up to 3 times. Color balance is not optimal for graphic design and menu options are limited. This is hood for non critical information analysis.

reviews.title: Your Choice Not Mine
reviews.review_text: Tried to set it up under 2 dirfferent computers one wouldnt recognize it and the other didnt think it was ghonna hook up, plus the sound quailty is not very good,

reviews.title: Not worth the discount
reviews.review_text: This monitor appears nice on the outside, as it is asthetically pleasing, however, once you get on the inside, nothing but disappointment lurks. This is one of those times where the old saying "you get what you pay for" comes into play. There is one, and only one, button on this whole screen and it is a toggle like a joystick that you would find on a game controller. Using this toggle is clunky and awkward, especially with your arm around the screen. Toggling through available selections and selecting something to change is a nightmare all in it's own. This wouldn't be such a big deal if I was only using one input but I often switch between the two and the functionality just ins't there. It's stupid, to say the least. My favorite part is that sometimes when switching between inputs, nothing happens, and you have to unplug the cable you're not trying to use. Lucikly my desk is set up in a way that I can get to the back of it easily, but I shouldn't have to. Aside from input control, the on screen text leaves something to be disired - the font looks...pixelated? I don't know how to explain it other than to say it is NOT clear. If it wasn't for the size of the screen, I would have trouble reading. I have not used this monitor for gaming, so I can't speak to that, but I have used it for streaming which is just o.k. The blacks aren't very deep and the colors are so so. I am using this as a second monitor to a Dell laptop and the Dell is crystal clear for comparison. Overall, this just wasn't a good purchase, and you can order the same monitor from Temu, if that tells you anything.

reviews.title: Beware if trying to mount it!
reviews.review_text: Decent monitor for the price. It's VESA 75x75, but almost all VESA mounts are dual 75/100, and the 100 is too large to fit in the recessed round back. Very poor design. They could have at least provided an adapter to be able to mount it.

reviews.title: great product, unfortunate event
reviews.review_text: love the product, came in fast but as i was assembling the stand heard noises inside the monitor itself just to come to realize that the screws that were required for the stand were inside the monitor itself. Forcing myself to open the monitor up to shake out the screws in order to get them to assemble it correctly.

reviews.title: Can u hear me now
reviews.review_text: the sound is terrible i contacted the seller sent them a videos of the sound they had the nerve to say they it has sound i had it on 100 it sounded like it was on 3 . dont waste your money with this company they dont stand behind their product

reviews.title: Totally upset!!
reviews.review_text: NEVER got product because shipping service shipped my product to the wrong address. Customer service representative said they would send out another one within 24-48 hours, but I have not received that replacement product either.

i bought the monitor for Christmas fornmy step son, and it didnt even last 3 months, startwd flickering and wont even turn on now, called the seller and they told me it onyl had a 30 day warranty, just wow 30 day's, contacted Walmart cuatomer support and they will not help either, so basically just scammed out of 126$.. Never again buying from seller or Walmart...

I work from home and purchased this to save desk space. Beautiful picture, sharp display. Built in speakers are poor quality, I can barely hear and volumes are turned up all the way. Not recommended for the speaker part, but overall still good quality screen for the price.

reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
reviews.review_text: Can't even give a proper review, because it didn't even work currently. No audio and for some reason, it refused to go full screen, even though settings was set correctly on both ends, it felt like a scam. I would stay as far away from this company as possible. I don't understand why Walmart deals with companies like this, it's been over a week and still haven't received my refund, because of Ordering Online. It can take up to two weeks to receive your refund so save the inconvenience and choose a different monitor.

i didnt read the reviews before I purchased first off. When the package got here everything was fine. I go to hook it up to my ps5 its starts glitching. I wouldn't recommend. Lowkey scamming should have just ordered off amazon. Sincerely your favorite yn.

reviews.title: Great buy! Bought 3
reviews.review_text: Was hesitant on buying until I read the other reviews but I'm so glad I bought them. I bought 3 at one time. One for me and 2 for my wife's new pc build. They work absolutely wonderfully and we couldn't be happier. So if you're balling on a budget, get this monitor! Just take the time to change the saturation and everything to what you desire and you will also be extremely happy.

reviews.title: Good Starter Monitor
reviews.review_text: Overall, the monitor is a good cheaper option, I only say that because of the controls for the monitor ... it is all in a Joystick type button on the back of the monitor which after figuring out how it worked wasn't terrible but still not preferred. The description says 100hz which is true once you connect it to a tower and change the settings to max it out ... comes set at 60hz which caused me to freak out at first but once adjusted imaging is as wanted. Front of box also had deep puncture in middle of the screen which thankfully the Styrofoam packing saved the monitor from being damaged.

It's good but the fact that it doesn't come with audio output installed in the monitor itself is really a big downgrade. Buttons kind of like it's an older model made in 2000, other than that it's fine. The dual screen isn't as good as I thought it would be

reviews.title: Great product BUT......
reviews.review_text: Ordered the monitor during Walmart's sale opposite Prime Day. It arrived quickly on 10/11/24. The monitor is beautiful, and the setup was easy. I especially like that the stand's ability to raise and lower the monitor. The picture is bright and clear. All in all I would rank it a 10 out of 10 and don't have any complaints EXCEPT that two weeks in, one of the pixels has blown out. Right in the middle of the screen. Unfortunately, I was not given the option to exchange it as I would be willing to give this monitor another chance so back to Walmart it goes. If you decide to give it a chance I would recommend getting an extended warranty.

Best monitor I've had for a long time my other monitors broke after only a few weeks I'm a streamer so good quality monitors are extremely important for my set up The only complaint I have is the volume you will need to purchase actual speakers for this product for good volume.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: This is the most reliable monitor I've ever had, as a professional trader I left my monitors 24/7 turned on, and no issues at all since almost a year, this is the 4th unit I have purchased, 2 units or 22”, one 24” and this one of 27”. Excellent and very recommended product.

reviews.title: Gamer Gratitude
reviews.review_text: The only complaint I have is the struggle to contact customer support with Gawfolk. But in everything else, this monitor is as amazing as it sounds. Easy on the eyes and makes my games look great. Time and again, this monitor has made my sessions a million times easier and I can see everything better. I've even proven to see other things better than my friends because of it. Instead of a bunch of different buttons for settings, there is only the singular one, which doubles as the power and a joystick to help with setting selection so you don't have to keep looking for each thing. Definitely happy I picked this one, and will be recommending to my friends.

reviews.title: Gawfolk monitor 27inch curved
reviews.review_text: Everything about it is beautiful for the price. Yet it's not a on brand product but it's way better than I expected. Really simple to set up. The controls on the monitor were complicated but yet easy to learn. The quality is crisp. I enjoy how you can fix any setting on the monitor makes it nice if you don't have a pc at the moment (That would be me) I'm working on it. I was scared that I couldn't do anything without a pc or anything. Your sure can this product the only down side I would say about it is the sound quality. I'm happy it comes with built in speakers. It's not the best sound but it's still definitely worth the money.

reviews.title: 1080P and 100hz - just awesome!
reviews.review_text: Before receiving the monitor, the company sent an email to make sure I knew the default was 60hz and that I would need to adjust it to get 100hz. That was a nice thing to do. I was also pleased to find, not only high quality screws for the very sturdy metal mount (with rubber pads on the feet), but also a set of spare high quality screws packaged along with the mounting hardware. That was another nice touch. I absolutely LOVE this monitor. It looks great. The price was amazing as well. Thank you Gawfolk and Walmart. You can could me as a very satisfied customer.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: i have not had much of a problem with deliveries from Walmart. When delivered by FedEx, there tend to be issues. This was to be left at the front door but was left on a picnic table in the front yard. They have no regard for their deliveries. If I order online and see FedEx, I will most likely look elsewhere for item.

reviews.review_text: The picture quality was not good. The screen looked washed out and pixelated. I have a gaming system with a very high end video card so that wasn't the issue. I end up purchasing a 32” LG computer monitor for about the same price and the picture quality is phenomenal!

The monitor would go blank after 1-2 min and would need to unplug for 5 min before it would work again. The power button and OSD buttons would not work unless unplugged for a few min. All these issues kept reoccuring within a few min of plugging it in. Tried to contact the company 5 times to have it fixed under warranty. They never responded.
